text: Anwar Aziz Chaudhry (1931 â€“ 22 November 2020) was a Pakistani politician and swimmer. He competed in three events at the 1948 Summer Olympics. He was the Interior Minister of Punjab."Anwar Aziz Choudhary : Father of Politics in Shakargarh" . 5 March 2014. From 1988 to 1990, he was a member of the National Assembly. Chaudhry died on 22 November 2020, at the age of 89. ==References== Category:1931 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Politicians from Punjab, Pakistan Category:Swimmers Category:Olympians for Pakistan
title: Anwar Aziz Chaudhry
